00026 # define TV_USEC_F 1000000l
00027 
00028 namespace TREX {
00029   namespace utils {

00040     inline bool operator< (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00041       return t1.tv_sec < t2.tv_sec ||
00042        (t1.tv_sec == t2.tv_sec && t1.tv_usec < t2.tv_usec);
00043     }
00044 
00054     inline bool operator==(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00055       return (t1.tv_sec == t2.tv_sec && t1.tv_usec == t2.tv_usec);
00056     }
00057     
00067     inline bool operator!=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00068       return !operator==(t1, t2);
00069     }
00070 
00080     inline bool operator> (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00081       return t2<t1;
00082     }
00083     
00093     inline bool operator<=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00094       return !operator> (t1, t2);
00095     }
00096 
00106     inline bool operator>=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00107       return !operator< (t1, t2);
00108     }
00109     
00118     inline timeval operator+ (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00119       timeval result;
00120       
00121       result.tv_sec = t1.tv_sec + t2.tv_sec;
00122       if ( (result.tv_usec = t1.tv_usec + t2.tv_usec)>=TV_USEC_F ) {
00123        ++result.tv_sec;
00124        result.tv_usec -= TV_USEC_F;
00125       }
00126       return result;
00127     }
00128 
00140     inline double to_double(timeval const &t) {
00141       double result = t.tv_usec;
00142       
00143       result /= TV_USEC_F;
00144       result += t.tv_sec;
00145       return result;
00146     }
00147 
00154     inline timeval to_timeval(double v) {
00155       timeval res;
00156       res.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(std::floor(v));
00157       res.tv_usec = static_cast<long>(std::floor((v-res.tv_sec)*1e6));
00158       return res;
00159     }
00160     
00171     inline timeval &operator+=(timeval &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00172       t1.tv_sec += t2.tv_sec;
00173       if ( (t1.tv_usec += t2.tv_usec) >= TV_USEC_F ) {
00174        ++t1.tv_sec;
00175        t1.tv_usec -= TV_USEC_F;
00176       }
00177       return t1;
00178     }
00179 
00188     inline timeval operator- (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00189       timeval result;
00190       result.tv_sec = t1.tv_sec - t2.tv_sec;
00191       if ( (result.tv_usec = t1.tv_usec - t2.tv_usec) < 0 ) {
00192        --result.tv_sec;
00193        result.tv_usec += TV_USEC_F;
00194       }
00195       return result;
00196     }
00197 
00206     inline timeval operator/ (timeval const &t, long n) {
00207       timeval result;
00208       
00209       result.tv_sec = t.tv_sec / n;
00210       result.tv_usec = ((t.tv_sec % n) * TV_USEC_F + t.tv_usec) / n;
00211       
00212       return result;
00213     }
00214 
00223     inline timeval operator* (timeval const &t, long n) {
00224       timeval result;
00225       
00226       result.tv_usec = t.tv_usec * n;
00227       result.tv_sec = t.tv_sec * n + (result.tv_usec) / TV_USEC_F;
00228       result.tv_usec = result.tv_usec % TV_USEC_F;
00229       
00230       return result;    
00231     }
00232     
00243     inline timeval &operator-=(timeval &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00244       t1.tv_sec -= t2.tv_sec;
00245       if ( (t1.tv_usec -= t2.tv_usec) < 0 ) {
00246        --t1.tv_sec;
00247        t1.tv_usec += TV_USEC_F;
00248       }
00249       return t1;
00250     }
00251 
00263     inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, timeval const& t) {
00264       if( t.tv_sec>=0 ) 
00265        return os<<t.tv_sec<<'.'<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<t.tv_usec;
00266       else {
00267        if( -1==t.tv_sec )
00268          os<<'-';
00269        return os<<(t.tv_sec+1)<<'.'<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')
00270                <<(TV_USEC_F-t.tv_usec);
00271       }       
00272     }
